group_1.textLeft: Soo...what're you worried abouuut~...?

group_1.textRight: Back then, I knew those people got@swallowed up on accident.
But why didn't the pillow open its mouth@the entire time?
Yet, it suddenly opened its mouth and@spat them all out...
And what's more...why the heck is there@a world inside the pillow?
On top of all that, why didn't anyone find@it strange they were having a party?

group_1.textLeft: Weh...I can't answer all of that at ooonce~...

group_1.textRight: Then tell me everything in order so I can@understand.
That should be easy enough for you.

group_1.textLeft: Mm~... First of aaall~...
I dunno why it's a pajama party world@in there...
Maybe 'cause my wish has to do with@sleepiiing~...?

group_1.textRight: Ahh...sure... That is like you, Hotaru...

group_1.textLeft: As for why no one thought having a party@was weeeird...
Maybe they thought it was all a dreaaam~...@I dunno, but...
As far as dreams go, at least while you're@havin' them...
"Weird" doesn't really cross your mind,@does it~...?

group_1.textRight: ...Well, I guess not.

group_1.textLeft: Mm~...next...why didn't it open up its@mouuth...?

group_1.textRight: Right.

group_1.textLeft: Mm~...you're already expecting it, but@I can tell you if you waaant...

group_1.textRight: It's fine.

group_1.textLeft: Those girls couldn't leave "yet"...so the mouth...
The way out was closed...I gueeess...?
I'm just guessin' here, buuut...
I think there's conditions in order to@get out of the pillooow...

group_1.textRight: Conditions...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's...sleepiiing~...?

group_1.textRight: Ehh...? Really? Why?

group_1.textLeft: Back then...they were...all trying to sleep,@weren't theeey~...?
They "fell asleep in their dream" and then@"woke up" from iiit~...

group_1.textRight: They woke up because they fell asleep...?@That's weird...

group_1.textLeft: Is iiit...?
If you sleep in a dream, do you have@another dream... Or do you wake up...?

group_1.textRight: ...Hmm... Well, we'll go with that.

group_1.textLeft: So theeen~... Everyone went to sleep,@the conditions were met,
the mouth opened,
and we all got spat out togetherrr~...

group_1.textRight: ...I think I get it.

group_1.textLeft: *Yaaawn...* Can I go to sleep nooow?
I answered all of iiit~...

group_1.textRight: Stop falling asleep while you're walking;@you'll fall.

group_1.textLeft: Akari'll catch me, so I'll be just fiiine~...

group_1.textRight: Geez, guess I can't help it...
...Haa, anyways, I'm just glad everyone@is safe.

group_1.textLeft: Sure aaam~...

group_1.textRight: Hey, what if...
They kept the party going forever and@never fell asleep?

group_1.textLeft: ...Eh~, usually...
When it eats things, they get digested,@I thiiink~...

group_1.textRight: Hold it, you mean the whole time they were@in a real big pinch?!
Damn, you're gettin' a lecture the whole@way home!

group_1.textLeft: Dooon't...I'm going to sleep~...

group_1.textRight: Oh no you don't! You are banned from@sleeping now!
Now reflect properly this time.

group_1.textLeft: Ee~hn...Akari...so haaarsh...
